website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a natural way to tackle all those fingerprints on the screens around your house, this Mom Screen product delivers as promised.
pros: Can clean all screens in your home
Works on smartphones, tablets, and other mobile device
Works very well to get the screen clean
Safe enough to use around young children
cons: The product is not antibacterial like some other laptop cleaners available

customer_reviews.title: MacBook owners STAY AWAY, this thing ruined my antiglare coat
customer_reviews.text: I had a late 2013 MacBook Pro in superb condition, I handled it with utter care since they discontinued that design, so I cleaned it every once in a while so it looked like new. Today I routinely tried to remove some strain from the monitor with light movements as I successfully did multiple times before, and apparently the cleaning liquid partially dissolved antiglare coat. Nice move, I paid 20 bucks to ruin my screen. I would recommend to keep this liquid away of antiglare screens, although the description says it's okay to use it for that purposes and marketing images got MacBooks all over.
